maintainer.name: Paul Healy
maintainer.description: Proxied maintainer; set to assignee in all bugs

pkgmetadata.longdescription: pdumpfs is a simple daily backup system similar to Plan9's dumpfs which preserves every daily snapshot. pdumpfs is written in Ruby. You can access the past snapshots at any time for retrieving a certain day's file. Let's backup your home directory with pdumpfs!
